short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: View personal letters from your past.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This chrome extension is an add on of a website that was made to allow users to write letters to give advice to their past selves, and read other's versions of these letters. Every new tab is a lesson that is authentic and important to someone in the world.
